days.text: Slight flooding will occur in Inner Harbour area from 7 ~ 10 pm due to astronomical tide. Mainly fine. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Slight flooding will occur in Inner Harbour area from 8 ~ 11 pm due to astronomical tide. Mainly fine. Force 3 to 5 northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cold and dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cold and dry. Fine. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
